Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Nobu Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Las Vegas, steps from The Linq and High Roller. This 5-star hotel is close to Las Vegas Convention Center and University of Nevada-Las Vegas.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 181 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and designer toiletries. Conveniences include a turndown service, housekeeping is provided daily, and cribs/infant beds (complimentary) can be requested.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Treat yourself with massages, body treatments, and facials. Before a night out at the casino, the 6 outdoor swimming pools are a perfect way to relax and recharge. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and an elevator (lift). Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

High Roller - 0.1 km / 0 mi
The Auto Collections - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Sands Expo Convention Center - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Crystals at City Center - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Fashion Show Mall - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
National Atomic Testing Museum - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Desert Research Institute - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Las Vegas Convention Center - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Thomas and Mack Center - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Las Vegas Country Club - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
University of Nevada-Las Vegas - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Marjorie Barrick Museum - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Orleans Arena - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Boulevard Mall - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi

The preferred airport for Nobu Hotel is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Room No: 1

The parking fees are as follows:
Up to 60 minutes – Free
1 hour – 4 hours – USD 7.00
4 hours – 24 hours – USD 10.00,Please Note:- You must show a valid photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all special requests cannot be guaranteed and are subject to availability upon check-in. Additional charges may apply.- Your credit card will be charged immediately by the hotel for the first night's room stay and tax. If the charge is unsuccessful, the reservation will be cancelled by the hotel.- Guests under the age of 21 can only check in with a parent or official guardian.- An additional 12% tax will be applied to the resort fee and this tax is not included in the booked rate.- Breakfast-included rates have a 10.00 USD limit for two guests per day. Please contact Nobu Hotel directly for additional information regarding extra guest charges for breakfast. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

For guests arriving from all origins, a minimum mandatory hotel-imposed fee of $41.21 (tax included) per room, per day will be charged and collected at check-in or check-out. The fee is subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to give the client an estimate of additional fees they may be responsible for, but is not a guarantee of the final amount due. For a detailed description of what is included in the mandatory fee, please see hotel policies.
